portfolio:
From Bauhaus I portfolio, 1985.  Per Accession form:
Double Set: Portfolio #6 and #7, published by Rudolf Kicken Gallery, 1984-85.  Set no. 15 in an edition of 70.  Each set comprised of 10 photographs.
signed: in ink, on verso: [1929]; [W.Funket] and German (?) inscription
text: Although on occasion there were disagreements among those attending and teaching at the Bauhaus School of Art and Design, there were also moments of respite.  This photograph by Walter Funkat, then a student at the Bauhaus, depicts a sphere that reflects the “Metal Festival” at the school, held in February 1929. Guests entered the party through a long metal slide into rooms decorated with dangling metal and glass orbs.
title: Glass Spheres, Metal Festival
